description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.0m in depth, maximum height of 3.7m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The development complies with the criteria set out in Schedule 2, Part, 1 Class A ofthe Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.

Please check the site address on some of your submitted plans, ie Plan 10200 SITE AND LOCATION PLAN shows the site address as Unit 81 Barwell Business Park. Please amend accordingly and resubmit all drawings are accurately labelled

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Suitable minor works to reduce lightly and maintain at an appropriate size for it's location while restoring good shape and balance in the interests of tree health.Recommendation:Approve.
